adventures.text: I was riding along the trail.
I was minding my own business.
I was camping in the woods.
I was exploring the Wilds.
I was on guard near the castle.
I was walking along the road.
I was tracking some deer.
I was looking for some shelter
When I was in a dungeon
When I was searching for treasure
And I had to defend a peasant from a goblin attack and I was injured by their arrows, I am happy that I survived.
And I had to rescue the princess from a Dragon and the battle was long and hard fought.
And I had to Slay the zombie king and his putrid blade gave me a sickness.
And was ambushed by a massive owlbear, The beast crushed my food
And I was attacked by highway men, I used my last spell on them
And I was assaulted by a roving band of goblins. They were lead by a large bugbear.
And I triggered a trap, a scythe came crashing down I blocked it with my sword
And I stepped on a plate and suddenly two spouts of flame singed my cloak.
And I found a sword, But when I touched it tried to attack me on its own. And it took a lot of magic to break the spell.
A thief tried to rob me and he ran off with my backpack
Also I dulled my blade on their shields
Also is there a place where a weary traveller can get some supplies.
Also they have seem to have pierced my armour
Also I am completely out of magic.
I'm also nearly out of potions.
Also I wouldn't mind to get to bed
I Also got hit hard on my helmet
Luckily im fine now
But now I'm completely out of water
I fell down while travelling back
